definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: One of the girls she rescued from a pimp later graduated from high school as valedictorian.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個她所救的女孩之後在高中畢業典禮上致辭。

sentences.english: She will give a touching valediction at graduation.
sentences.chinese: 她將在畢業典禮作感人的告別演講。

sentences.english: Think Mr. Phipps would let me take time off after endgame ?
sentences.chinese: 你說畢業典禮後菲普斯先生能讓我們去試試嗎？

sentences.english: Graduation ceremony is an important part of rituals activities in school.
sentences.chinese: 畢業典禮是學校生活中的一種重要儀典活動。

sentences.english: This marked the beginning of the 131st commencement.
sentences.chinese: 校歌響起，標誌着第131屆畢業典禮正式開始。

sentences.english: That’s why I was invited to speak at your graduation.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼我被邀請來在你們的畢業典禮上演講。

sentences.english: Linda will give a touching valediction at graduation.
sentences.chinese: 琳達將在畢業典禮上作感人的告別演講。

sentences.english: At our convocation ceremony we all threw our caps in the air.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的畢業典禮上，我們都把學士帽拋到空中。

sentences.english: The commencement was held in the grand hall.
sentences.chinese: 畢業典禮在豪華的大廳舉行。

sentences.english: Did anyone cry in the commencement?
Thank__you__for__coming__ today to attend the graduation ceremony at No. 3 Junior High School.
sentences.chinese: 感謝你們今天來參加第三中學的畢業典禮。

sentences.english: China and India were the largest markets for both enrolments and commencements in all sectors.
sentences.chinese: 中國和印度爲招生和各部門畢業典禮上最大的市場。

sentences.english: Many American universities have their commencements in May or June.
sentences.chinese: 美國很多大學的畢業典禮都在五月或六月。

sentences.english: Then I went to look up what commencement meant.
sentences.chinese: 然後就去看畢業典禮到底是啥意思啊。

sentences.english: Each of those graduations was nice.
sentences.chinese: 其中每個畢業典禮都是非常好。

sentences.english: Before He, very few Chinese students applied for the distinction of delivering a postgraduate commencement speech.
sentences.chinese: 在何江之前，很少中國學生申請在畢業典禮上發言。

definition: school begins/give a course/teach a subject
anniversary of the founding of a school
Fu Jen Catholic University of Peking (from 1925), forerunner of Beijing Normal University 北京師範大學|北京师范大学/Fu Jen Catholic University in New Taipei City, Taiwan
to begin a lecture/to start on a story
